alert.note: Alert for Central Greenville; Northern Spartanburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 2:19AM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Greenville and northwestern Spartanburg Counties through 245 AM EDT... At 219 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles west of Spartanburg, or near Inman, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Greer, Boiling Springs SC, Lyman, Wellford, Inman, Lake Bowen, USC Upstate and Fingerville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
